summary.para: Raised by the media pipeline when a new is available.

param.name: sensorActivitiesReport
param.para: Receives a pointer to the new .

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Interface implemented by the client to receive callbacks when sensor activity reports are available.

remarks.para: Register the callback by passing an implementation of this interface into .
